Authors:
Yanan Cao, yingxiong qiu, Hans Peter Comes, Shota
Sakaguchi, Luyao Chen
Title:
Evolution of East AsiaÂ’s Arcto-Tertiary relict Euptelea
(Eupteleaceae) shaped by Late Neogene vicariance and Quaternary climate
change
Keywords:
Arcto-Tertiary flora, East Asia, ecological niche
modelling, Euptelea, molecular dating, niche identity tests,
phylogeographical inference
Abstract:
ABSTRACT Aim The evolutionary origin and historical
demography of extant Arcto-Tertiary forest species in East Asia has been
widely debated. Here, we aimed to reconstruct the evolutionary and
population demographic history of two extant Euptelea species in China
(E. pleiosperma) and Japan (E. polyandra).
